sentences.en: A small car is more economical to run.
Buying in bulk is more economical than shopping for small quantities.
sentences.cn: 批量采购要比零买实惠很多。

sentences.en: Coke is an economical fuel but it leaves a lot of ash.
sentences.cn: 焦炭是一种很经济的燃料,可是燃烧后剩下很多灰.

sentences.en: Fans of electric cars say they are clean, quiet and economical.
sentences.cn: 电动汽车迷们说，电动车清洁、无噪音而且经济。

sentences.en: His gestures were economical, his words generally mild.
sentences.cn: 他的肢体语言极尽简化，措词总体温和。

sentences.en: It is economical to run and ecologically sound.
sentences.cn: 这样做比较经济，而且不会破坏生态。

sentences.en: It is inexpensive to buy and economical to run.
sentences.cn: 它价格低廉,行驶费用也经济.

sentences.en: It is more economical to wash a full load.
It's more economical to use gas than coal.
Mexican cookery is economical, she says. Nothing goes to waste.
sentences.cn: “墨西哥的烹调注重俭省，”她说，“任何东西都不会浪费。”

sentences.en: My new car is economical of fuel.
sentences.cn: 我的新汽车节省燃料[不费油].

sentences.en: She is an economical housekeeper and feeds her family cheaply.
sentences.cn: 她节约持家,一家人吃得很省.

sentences.en: Sometimes expensive drugs or other treatments can be economical in the long run.
sentences.cn: 有时昂贵的药物或其他治疗方法从长远来看可能是比较划算的。

sentences.en: The lorry is very economical on fuel and yet has a good turn of speed when required.
sentences.cn: 这辆卡车很省油,而且需要时还能开快.

sentences.en: This was a most economical way to get over it.
sentences.cn: 这是一种最省钱的蒙混办法.

sentences.en: We must find economical methods for extracting oil from shale.
sentences.cn: 我们必须找到从页岩中采油的经济方法.

words.tran_cn: 经济的，经济上的；经济学的
经济地；在经济上；节俭地
经济学；国家的经济状况
节约装置；节约者；经济家

phrases.tran_cn: 经济效率，经济效果；经济有效
(婉)（人或陈述）很少提供实情的，谎话连篇的

trans.tran_cn: 经济的，节约的，简洁的，精打细算的
trans.tran_en: using money, time, goods etc carefully and without wasting any
